content:
Electric Love音乐节。由Revolution Event GmbH经营。每年七月第二个周末在奥地利的Plainfeld举办。音乐节的大牌包括Armin van Buuren，Hardwell，Dimitri Vegas和Like Mike，David Guetta，Martin Garrix，Axwell，Sebastian Ingrosso，Tiësto等。2014年音乐节吸引了100,000多名与会者。

 

根据《EMF》的报道，该音乐节是“奥地利领先的电子音乐节”。
contentEn:
Electric Love[1] is an electronic dance music festival held annually since 2013.[2] Takes place at the second weekend in July at the Salzburgring in Plainfeld, Austria. Headliners have included Armin van Buuren, Hardwell, Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike, David Guetta, Martin Garrix, Axwell, Sebastian Ingrosso, Tiësto etc. According to Technoton Magazin, the 2014 festival attracted over 100,000 attendees. It is operated by Revolution Event GmbH.[3]

 

According to EMF Magazine, the festival is "Austria's leading electronic music festival".[4]

 

References

  1. ^ https://www.electriclove.at/en/line-up
  2. ^ Magdalena Dorner, Christopher Tafeit, Silke Bruckner (un)geschriebene Geschichten: Zeitpunkte aus Europa 3738644024 2015 p20 "In ein paar Tagen fahren wir gemeinsam zum „Electric Love“ Festival."
  3. ^ [1][dead link]
  4. ^ "ELECTRIC LOVE FESTIVAL @ Salzburg (10-12/7) | EMF". Emfmag.net. Archived from the original on 2014-08-05. Retrieved 2015-10-17.
  5. ^ Jump up to:a b c d e f g h "Electric Love Festival 2017". Festicket. Retrieved 2020-02-25.
  6. ^ Jump up to:a b c d e f g h "Electric Love Festival 2018". Festicket. Retrieved 2020-02-25.
  7. ^ Jump up to:a b c d e f g h i j "Electric Love Festival 2019". Festicket. Retrieved 2020-02-25.
  8. ^ "Abgesagt: Electric Love Festival fällt heuer aus".
  9. ^ salzburg ORF at red (2021-05-07). "Electric Love: Kleineres Festival im August" (in German).
